ing: 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced
1 fresh Anaheim chile, seeded and sliced
2 tablespoons fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
des: "A fresh apple salsa that combines tart apples with chile peppers, lime juice, cilantro, toasted walnuts, and ginger. A great appetizer!"
ins: In a large bowl, stir together apples and lime juice. Stir in jalapeno and Anaheim chile slices. Stir in onion, cilantro, walnuts, ginger, and salt. Mix thoroughly.
